nodes.text: Early on in the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, Republic agents aboard the space station Kilran's Lance above Aeten II disabled the station's defenses and a Republic fleet attacked the station. However, the Empire's Fury squadron arrived in time to drive off the attackers and secure the station.
In some parts of the game's text files, Aeten II is mistakenly referred to as Aeten Ten, but mission log text relating to the Aeten Defense mission correctly names it as Aeten Two.
